messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

LGTM https://codereview.appspot.com/7958043/diff/3001/doc/go1.1.html File doc/go1.1.html (right): https://codereview.appspot.com/7958043/diff/3001/doc/go1.1.html#newcode279 doc/go1.1.html:279: It simplifies the problem by just stopping on problematic s/just stopping/aborting/ ? https://codereview.appspot.com/7958043/diff/3001/doc/go1.1.html#newcode378 doc/go1.1.html:378: only T. there ain't no package T, overzealous use of automation :)

https://codereview.appspot.com/7958043/diff/3001/doc/go1.1.html File doc/go1.1.html (right): https://codereview.appspot.com/7958043/diff/3001/doc/go1.1.html#newcode279 doc/go1.1.html:279: It simplifies the problem by just stopping on problematic On 2013/03/22 05:24:59, adg wrote: > s/just stopping/aborting/ ? to me aborting means killing the program. rewritten. https://codereview.appspot.com/7958043/diff/3001/doc/go1.1.html#newcode378 doc/go1.1.html:378: only T. On 2013/03/22 05:24:59, adg wrote: > there ain't no package T, overzealous use of automation :) Done.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=9ca85035f95a ***
